courses.name: Piano Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the piano, including scales, chords, and simple songs.

courses.name: Guitar Basics
courses.description: Introduction to guitar playing, covering basic chords, strumming, and fingerpicking.

courses.name: Violin Masterclass
courses.description: An advanced violin course for experienced players looking to refine their skills.

courses.name: Singing Workshop
courses.description: Develop your vocal abilities with personalized coaching and group exercises.

courses.name: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Start your drumming journey with basic rhythms and drum kit techniques.

courses.name: Flute for All Ages
courses.description: Learn to play the flute, suitable for all age groups.

courses.name: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Explore the art of songwriting and composition.

courses.name: Bass Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Master the bass guitar with advanced techniques and grooves.

courses.name: Classical Guitar Classics
courses.description: Explore classical guitar music and techniques.

courses.name: Advanced Drum Solo
courses.description: Take your drumming skills to the next level with intricate solos.
